title: Can't redeem Riot Girl Tristana
body:
"There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persists, please contact us at support.riotgames.com"
I've been trying every once in awhile for about 4 months. Pls rito, I need skin to win

replies.body:
Eeeehhhh sometimes those free promo skin codes just don't wanna work correctly is all. No worries fam, we poro's gotchu!

Double check your collection now, and make sure to refresh your client if you don't see her ^_^!
